$eref.description: Data Lake Store account properties information.

___suffix.description: Gets or sets the optional suffix for the Data Lake Store account.

___properties.description: Gets or sets the properties for the Data Lake Store account being added.

___suffix.description: Gets or sets the optional suffix for the Data Lake account.

___accessKey.description: Gets or sets the access key associated with this Azure Storage account that will be used to connect to it.

___properties.description: Gets or sets the properties for the Azure Storage account being added.

___location.description: Gets or sets the account regional location.

___tags.description: Gets or sets the value of custom properties.

$eref.description: The account specific properties that are associated with an underlying Data Lake Analytics account.

___maxDegreeOfParallelism.description: Gets or sets the maximum supported degree of parallelism for this account.

___defaultDataLakeStoreAccount.description: Gets or sets the default data lake storage account associated with this Data Lake Analytics account.

___storageAccounts.description: Gets or sets the list of Azure Blob storage accounts associated with this account.

___maxJobCount.description: Gets or sets the maximum supported jobs running under the account at the same time.

___dataLakeStoreAccounts.description: Gets or sets the list of Data Lake storage accounts associated with this account.

___properties.description: Gets or sets the properties defined by Data Lake Analytics all properties are specific to each resource provider.
Gets or sets the properties for the Data Lake Store account being added.
